io.mosip.registration.service.external

Interface ZipCreationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZipCreationServiceImpl

    public interface ZipCreationService
    Interface to generate the in-memory zip file for Registration Packet
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Balaji Sridharan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] createPacket(RegistrationDTO registrationDTO, Map<String,byte[]> jsonMap)
      Returns the byte array of the packet zip file containing the Registration Details

    • Method Detail

      • createPacket

        byte[] createPacket(RegistrationDTO registrationDTO,
                    Map<String,byte[]> jsonMap)
             throws RegBaseCheckedException
        Returns the byte array of the packet zip file containing the Registration Details
        Parameters:
        registrationDTO - the Registration to be stored in zip file
        jsonMap - contains the map of files to be zipped
        Returns:
        the byte array of packet zip file
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - if any error occurs while zipping the files
